00014 #ifndef __MLPACK_METHODS_FASTMKS_FASTMKS_STAT_HPP
00015 #define __MLPACK_METHODS_FASTMKS_FASTMKS_STAT_HPP

00017 #include <mlpack/core.hpp>
00018 #include <mlpack/core/tree/tree_traits.hpp>
00019 
00020 namespace mlpack {
00021 namespace fastmks {
00022 
00027 class FastMKSStat
00028 {
00029  public:
00033   FastMKSStat() :
00034       bound(-DBL_MAX),
00035       selfKernel(0.0),
00036       lastKernel(0.0),
00037       lastKernelNode(NULL)
00038   { }
00039 
00047   template<typename TreeType>
00048   FastMKSStat(const TreeType& node) :
00049       bound(-DBL_MAX),
00050       lastKernel(0.0),
00051       lastKernelNode(NULL)
00052   {
00053     // Do we have to calculate the centroid?
00054     if (tree::TreeTraits<TreeType>::FirstPointIsCentroid)
00055     {
00056       // If this type of tree has self-children, then maybe the evaluation is
00057       // already done.  These statistics are built bottom-up, so the child stat
00058       // should already be done.
00059       if ((tree::TreeTraits<TreeType>::HasSelfChildren) &&
00060           (node.NumChildren() > 0) &&
00061           (node.Point(0) == node.Child(0).Point(0)))
00062       {
00063         selfKernel = node.Child(0).Stat().SelfKernel();
00064       }
00065       else
00066       {
00067         selfKernel = sqrt(node.Metric().Kernel().Evaluate(
00068             node.Dataset().unsafe_col(node.Point(0)),
00069             node.Dataset().unsafe_col(node.Point(0))));
00070       }
00071     }
00072     else
00073     {
00074       // Calculate the centroid.
00075       arma::vec centroid;
00076       node.Centroid(centroid);
00077 
00078       selfKernel = sqrt(node.Metric().Kernel().Evaluate(centroid, centroid));
00079     }
00080   }
00081 
00083   double SelfKernel() const { return selfKernel; }
00085   double& SelfKernel() { return selfKernel; }
00086 
00088   double Bound() const { return bound; }
00090   double& Bound() { return bound; }
00091 
00093   double LastKernel() const { return lastKernel; }
00095   double& LastKernel() { return lastKernel; }
00096 
00098   void* LastKernelNode() const { return lastKernelNode; }
00101   void*& LastKernelNode() { return lastKernelNode; }
00102 
00103  private:
00105   double bound;
00106 
00108   double selfKernel;
00109 
00111   double lastKernel;
00112 
00115   void* lastKernelNode;
00116 };
00117 
00118 }; // namespace fastmks
00119 }; // namespace mlpack

00121 #endif
